problem.markdown:
1. Due to compaction the parameters which increase in magnitude is (x) Shear strength () Void ratio () % of air voids () None
2) Modified proctor test is used for (x) Runways () Highways () Embankments () Earthen dams
3) Energy ratio in modified proctor test to standard proctor test is given by (x) 4.55 () 4 () 3.55 () None
4) For pure sandy soils (x) Compaction curve is not useful () A well defined OMC exists () Modified proctor test is recommended () Jodhpur miniature compaction test is recommended
5) The 95% saturation line and 5% air voids line are () Same (x) Different () Both a and b () None
6) Compaction of a soil is measured in terms of (x) Dry density () Specific gravity () Compressibility () Permeability
7) Factors effecting the compaction are () Water content () Compaction energy () Soil type (x) All the above
8) In a compaction test with increase in compactive effort () Maximum dry density increase but OMC decreases () The compaction cure is shifted to the left and higher (x) Both the above () Both maximum dry density and OMC increases
9) Relative compaction is () Similar to relative density (x) A compaction process () A ratio of ᵞd of field to the ᵞd of lab () 0.01mm
10) Standard proctor test is also known as (x) I.S light compaction test () I.S heavy compaction test () None () Both a and b
